segments.text: Look at the dishes ! I have told you three times to put away these dishes . But now ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don ’ t be angry . I just thought you might need them sometime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have told you that I don ’ t need them any more . The thing that really annoys me is that you played dumb with me .
segments.speaker: S2
